original_text:
Astro Cat
Quando si combinano anime giapponesi, gioco di slot a tema asiatico e una dose a volontà di Hello Kitty, oltre a correre il rischio di essere coinvolti, quello che si ottiene è rappresentato dai 1296 modi per vincere il nuovo gioco di slot Astro Cat. Oh sì, ci mancava un po’ lo spazio, questo gatto ha un sacco di cose da fare! A prima vista non eravamo sicuri se un designer fosse diventato un mascalzone o se questa fosse una seria produzione di slot di Lightning box, a quanto pare il tema eclettico è solo una parte del fascino del gioco.
Disponibile sia su dispositivi mobili che desktop, sia per il gioco gratuito che come vera e propria slot a pagamento, questo gioco spera chiaramente di stupire con il suo tema, il gameplay e la struttura innovativa. Come per la popolare slot machine Druidess Gold di Lightning Box, Astro Cat utilizza il sistema reelfecta, dove due bobine 2×3 si trovano accanto a una bobina a griglia a 16 posizioni al centro. Sembra un po’ confuso, ma per lo più gioca come una slot con bobina 5×3, dato il formato di vincita.
Astro Cat ti permetterà di fare un viaggio in Cina, con una bobina 8 e 1.296 modi per vincere slot da Lightning Box Games. Viene fornita una funzione bonus che premia fino a una dozzina di giri gratis completi di blocchi e premi pagati fino a 16 volte grazie al motore di gioco Reelfecta. Gioca da 50 centesimi a 1.250€ a giro.
Una grafica spaziale
Semplicemente non riesco a spiegare il tema di questo gioco, ci sono troppe cose in ballo. L’Astro Cat del titolo dei giochi forma il gioco wild ed è chiaramente in qualche folle avventura cosmica. Per qualche ragione questo gioco ha richiesto un tema in qualche forma di antico scenario asiatico, quindi si ottengono bobine incorniciate in stile cinese tradizionale, con un gatto anime giapponese, e alcuni fuochi d’artificio come bonus trigger.
Ci sono anche altre immagini asiatiche nel resto dei rulli, con bonsai, carpe koi, fan cinesi e rane fortunate che fanno parte del montaggio delle icone a pagamento. Il resto dei simboli dei pagamenti è completato dai simboli delle carte da gioco reali e per una volta non ci dispiace; se tutti i simboli di questo set di rulli giganti fossero fatti su misura, penso che ci si avventurerebbe troppo.
L’audio è buono: non ispira, ma è difficile produrre una sola traccia musicale per accogliere tutti i diversi stili; gli effetti sonori sono comunque superbi e le animazioni e la resa sono eccellenti. Non c’è alcun dubbio sulle credenziali visive di questo gioco, o sulla cura con cui è stato gestito il lavoro di produzione, questo è ben lontano dal vecchio gioco di slot Fortune 8 Cat.
Le immagini hanno una forte impronta asiatica – alle carte da gioco di minor valore si aggiungono i fan, un bonsai, un pesce rosso, una rana verde e un drago. Il gatto in stile anime è il wild del gioco – appare solo sui rulli 3 e 4 e sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli oltre al bonus.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Con un formato di 1296 modi per vincere, la puntata minima è di 0,50 monete a un valore di 0,01, questo può essere aumentato in modo esponenziale e si può scegliere anche un moltiplicatore di scommesse fino a 5 volte. Non ci sono linee di pagamento da selezionare, quindi si tratta semplicemente di colpire manualmente o,se pigro come me, auto-spintare una volta selezionata la scommessa desiderata. L’azione di gioco di base è un po’ silenziosa, come molti nuovi titoli di giochi di slot online, Astro Cat si affida ad un sistema di bonus che costruisce in intensità per offrire grandi premi di combinazione. La RTP è generosa, il rapporto di successo, d’altra parte, non tanto.
Il simbolo jolly Astro Cat sostituisce tutti i simboli di questo gioco, compreso, cosa molto importante, il simbolo dello scatter del gioco che fa scattare fino a 13 giri gratis. Questo potrebbe non sembrare il numero più fortunato, tuttavia i simboli wild sulla bobina centrale reelfecta sono persistenti o appiccicosi, ogni volta che ne appare uno rimane al suo posto per tutta la durata dei giri, aggiungendo anche un giro extra come re-trigger. Se si sente l’intera casella centrale con i wilds durante i giri liberi si può innescare un singolo mega giro. Il simbolo che non volete vedere è il vetro avvelenato, segnato dall’onnipresente teschio e dalle ossa incrociate, questo metterà immediatamente fine ai giri liberi.
Il simbolo dei fuochi d’artificio è il bonus, che appare solo sui rulli esterni della Reelfecta. L’atterraggio di 5 o più di questi sullo stesso giro farà scattare la funzione Free Spins, dove si potranno vedere fino a 12 giri liberi.
Una volta che i giri liberi iniziano, tenete d’occhio il Reelfecta – partendo dalla posizione esterna in alto a sinistra, apparirà un +1 Gatto Selvatico o un simbolo di veleno. Se atterrate il +1 Gatto Selvaggio, riceverete un ulteriore giro libero e il wild sarà congelato al suo posto. Qui possono essere assegnati fino a 12 giri extra gratuiti.
Riempite 12 posizioni esterne con Wild Cats e riempirete anche le posizioni interne – questo crea 1 gigantesco wild a 16 simboli. Riceverete quindi 1 Mega Spin con tutti i wild extra al loro posto. Se il veleno appare, riceverete un payout equivalente a 2 volte la scommessa e la funzione termina. È garantito che non riceverai un veleno nei primi 3 giri gratuiti.
Il motore di gioco poco ortodosso e l’insolita funzione Reelfecta rendono l’Astro Cat più complesso di quanto non sia in realtà.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Vi consiglio di dare un’occhiata a Playtech che offre molte slot a tema cinese come Sun Wukong e Jade Emperor.

raw_translation.response:
Astro Cat
When Japanese anime, Asian-themed slot games and an abundance of Hello Kitty are combined, one is taking a risk, but what you get is represented by the 1296 ways to win the new slot game Astro Cat. Oh yes, we were missing space, this cat has a lot to do! At first glance, we were not sure if a designer had become a rogue or if this was a serious production of Lightning Box slot, as it seems that the eclectic theme is just part of the game's charm.

Available on both mobile and desktop devices, both for free play and as a real money slot, this game clearly hopes to impress with its theme, gameplay, and innovative structure. Like the popular Druidess Gold slot machine from Lightning Box, Astro Cat uses the Reelfecta system, where two 2x3 reels sit next to a 16-position grid reel in the center. It seems a bit confusing, but mostly plays like a 5x3 reel slot, given the winning format.

Astro Cat will take you on a journey to China with an 8 reel and 1296 ways to win slot from Lightning Box Games. A bonus feature is provided that rewards up to a dozen free spins complete with blocks and prizes paid up to 16 times thanks to the Reelfecta game engine. Play from 50 cents up to €1250 per spin.

Space Graphics
I simply cannot explain the theme of this game, there is too much going on. The Astro Cat of the game's title forms the wild game and is clearly in some crazy cosmic adventure. For some reason, this game required a theme in some form of ancient Asian setting, so you get reels framed in traditional Chinese style, with a Japanese anime cat, and some fireworks as a bonus trigger.

There are also other Asian images in the rest of the reels, with bonsai trees, koi carp, Chinese fans, and lucky frogs that are part of the paid icon assembly. The rest of the payment symbols are completed by real playing card symbols and for that once we do not mind; if all the symbols on this giant reel set were tailor-made, I think we would be venturing too far.

The audio is good: it doesn't inspire, but it's hard to produce a single track to accommodate all the different styles; the sound effects are superb, and the animations and rendering are excellent. There is no doubt about the visual credentials of this game, or the care with which the production work has been handled, this is well away from the old Fortune 8 Cat slot game.

The images have a strong Asian touch - in addition to the lower value playing cards, there are fans, bonsai trees, a red fish, a green frog and a dragon. The Japanese anime-style cat is the game's wild - it only appears on reels 3 and 4 and replaces all other symbols except the bonus.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols
With a 1296 ways to win format, the minimum bet is 0.50 coins at a value of 0.01, this can be increased exponentially, and you can also choose a bet multiplier of up to 5 times. There are no paylines to select, so it's simply a matter of manually hitting or, if you're as lazy as me, auto-spinning once the desired bet is selected. The basic gameplay action is a bit silent, like many new online slot game titles, Astro Cat relies on a bonus system that builds in intensity to offer big combination prizes. The RTP is generous, the hit rate, on the other hand, is not as much.

The Astro Cat wild symbol replaces all the symbols in this game, including, very importantly, the game's scatter symbol that triggers up to 13 free spins. This may not seem like the luckiest number, however, wild symbols on the Reelfecta center reel are persistent or sticky, each time one appears it remains in place for the duration of the spins, also adding an extra spin as a re-trigger. If you fill the whole center box with wilds during the free spins, it can trigger a single mega spin. The symbol you don't want to see is the poisoned glass, marked by the ubiquitous skull and crossbones, this will immediately end the free spins.

The fireworks symbol is the bonus, which only appears on the outer reels of the Reelfecta. Landing 5 or more of these on the same spin will trigger the Free Spins feature, where you can see up to 12 free spins.

Once the free spins begin, keep an eye on the Reelfecta - starting from the top left outside position, a +1 Wild Cat or a poison symbol will appear. If you land the +1 Wild Cat, you will receive an additional free spin, and the wild will be frozen in place. Here, up to 12 additional free spins can be awarded.

Fill 12 outer positions with Wild Cats and you will also fill the inner positions - this creates 1 giant wild with 16 symbols. You will then receive 1 Mega Spin with all the extra wilds in place. If the poison appears, you will receive a payout equivalent to 2 times the bet, and the feature ends. It is guaranteed that you will not receive a poison in the first 3 free spins.

The unorthodox game engine and unusual Reelfecta feature make Astro Cat more complex than it really is.
Other similar slot machines
I recommend checking out Playtech, which offers many Chinese-themed slots such as Sun Wukong and Jade Emperor.

L’audio è buono: non ispira, ma è difficile produrre una sola traccia musicale per accogliere tutti i diversi stili; gli effetti sonori sono comunque superbi e le animazioni e la resa sono eccellenti. Non c’è alcun dubbio sulle credenziali visive di questo gioco, o sulla cura con cui è stato gestito il lavoro di produzione, questo è ben lontano dal vecchio gioco di slot Fortune 8 Cat.
Le immagini hanno una forte impronta asiatica – alle carte da gioco di minor valore si aggiungono i fan, un bonsai, un pesce rosso, una rana verde e un drago. Il gatto in stile anime è il wild del gioco – appare solo sui rulli 3 e 4 e sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli oltre al bonus.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Con un formato di 1296 modi per vincere, la puntata minima è di 0,50 monete a un valore di 0,01, questo può essere aumentato in modo esponenziale e si può scegliere anche un moltiplicatore di scommesse fino a 5 volte. Non ci sono linee di pagamento da selezionare, quindi si tratta semplicemente di colpire manualmente o,se pigro come me, auto-spintare una volta selezionata la scommessa desiderata. L’azione di gioco di base è un po’ silenziosa, come molti nuovi titoli di giochi di slot online, Astro Cat si affida ad un sistema di bonus che costruisce in intensità per offrire grandi premi di combinazione. La RTP è generosa, il rapporto di successo, d’altra parte, non tanto.
Il simbolo jolly Astro Cat sostituisce tutti i simboli di questo gioco, compreso, cosa molto importante, il simbolo dello scatter del gioco che fa scattare fino a 13 giri gratis. Questo potrebbe non sembrare il numero più fortunato, tuttavia i simboli wild sulla bobina centrale reelfecta sono persistenti o appiccicosi, ogni volta che ne appare uno rimane al suo posto per tutta la durata dei giri, aggiungendo anche un giro extra come re-trigger. Se si sente l’intera casella centrale con i wilds durante i giri liberi si può innescare un singolo mega giro. Il simbolo che non volete vedere è il vetro avvelenato, segnato dall’onnipresente teschio e dalle ossa incrociate, questo metterà immediatamente fine ai giri liberi.
Il simbolo dei fuochi d’artificio è il bonus, che appare solo sui rulli esterni della Reelfecta. L’atterraggio di 5 o più di questi sullo stesso giro farà scattare la funzione Free Spins, dove si potranno vedere fino a 12 giri liberi.
Una volta che i giri liberi iniziano, tenete d’occhio il Reelfecta – partendo dalla posizione esterna in alto a sinistra, apparirà un +1 Gatto Selvatico o un simbolo di veleno. Se atterrate il +1 Gatto Selvaggio, riceverete un ulteriore giro libero e il wild sarà congelato al suo posto. Qui possono essere assegnati fino a 12 giri extra gratuiti.
Riempite 12 posizioni esterne con Wild Cats e riempirete anche le posizioni interne – questo crea 1 gigantesco wild a 16 simboli. Riceverete quindi 1 Mega Spin con tutti i wild extra al loro posto. Se il veleno appare, riceverete un payout equivalente a 2 volte la scommessa e la funzione termina. È garantito che non riceverai un veleno nei primi 3 giri gratuiti.
Il motore di gioco poco ortodosso e l’insolita funzione Reelfecta rendono l’Astro Cat più complesso di quanto non sia in realtà.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Vi consiglio di dare un’occhiata a Playtech che offre molte slot a tema cinese come Sun Wukong e Jade Emperor.

message.content:
Astro Cat: An Epic Slot Journey into Space!

When you combine Japanese anime, an Asian-themed slot game and a generous dose of Hello Kitty, what you get is the 1296 ways-to-win Astro Cat slot game. This space-savvy cat has a whole lot going on! At first glance, we weren't sure if the designer had gone rogue or if this was a serious production by Lightning Box, but the eclectic theme is part of the game's charm.

Available both on mobile and desktop, as well as for free or as a real-money slot game, Astro Cat hopes to impress with its innovative theme, gameplay, and structure. Like the popular Druidess Gold slot game by Lightning Box, Astro Cat employs the Reelfecta system, where two 2x3 reels are adjacent to a 16-position grid reel center. It may seem a bit confusing, but it mostly plays like a 5x3 reel slot, given the win format.

Astro Cat takes you on a journey to China, with an eight-reel, 1296 ways-to-win slot game from Lightning Box Games. The game features a bonus function that rewards up to a dozen complete free spins, complete with blocks and prizes paid up to 16 times thanks to the Reelfecta game engine. Play from 50 cents to 1,250€ per spin.

Superb Graphics

I simply can't explain the theme of this game - there are too many things at play. The Astro Cat in the game's title acts as the wild and is clearly on some mad cosmic adventure. For some reason, this game required an ancient Asian-themed setting, so you get Chinese-style framed reels, a Japanese anime cat and some fireworks as a bonus trigger.

There are other Asian images on the rest of the reels, with bonsai, koi carp, Chinese fans and lucky frogs part of the setup of paying icons. The rest of the paying symbol set is completed by the standard playing card symbols, which, for once, we don't mind. If all the symbols on this giant reel set were custom-made, I think we would be venturing too far.

The audio is decent - it doesn't inspire, but it's difficult to produce a single music track to accommodate all the different styles. The sound effects are superb, and the animation and rendering are excellent. There's no doubt about the visual credentials of this game, or about the care with which the production work was handled - this is a far cry from the old Fortune 8 Cat slot game.

Function and Symbols of the Slot Machine

With a 1296 ways-to-win format, the minimum bet is 0.50 coins at a value of 0.01, which can be increased exponentially, and you can also choose a betting multiplier of up to 5 times. There are no paylines to select, so it's simply a matter of hitting manually or, if you're lazy like me, auto-spinning once your desired bet is selected. The base gameplay is a bit silent, like many new online slot game titles - Astro Cat relies on a bonus system that builds up in intensity to offer big combination rewards. The RTP is generous, but the success ratio, on the other hand, not so much.

The Astro Cat wild symbol replaces all symbols in this game, including, most importantly, the game's scatter symbol that triggers up to 13 free spins. This may not seem like the luckiest number, however wild symbols on the reelfecta central reel are sticky, every time one appears, it remains in place for the duration of the spins, adding one extra spin as a re-trigger. If the entire central grid is filled with wilds during free spins, you can trigger a single mega spin. The symbol you don't want to see is the poisoned glass, marked by the ubiquitous skull and crossbones, this immediately ends the free spins.

The fireworks symbol is the bonus symbol, which appears only on the outer reels of the Reelfecta. Landing five or more of these on the same spin will trigger the Free Spins feature, where you can see up to 12 free spins.

Once free spins start, keep an eye on the Reelfecta - starting from the top left outer position, a +1 Wild Cat or a poison symbol will appear. If you land a +1 Wild Cat, you'll get an extra free spin, and the wild cat will freeze in place. Here, up to 12 extra free spins can be awarded.

Fill up all the 12 outer positions with Wild Cats and you'll also fill the central positions - this creates one giant 16-symbol wild. You'll then receive one Mega Spin with all the extra wilds in place. If the poison appears, you'll receive a payout equivalent to 2 times the bet, and the feature ends. You're guaranteed not to receive a poison in the first three free spins.

The unorthodox game engine and unusual Reelfecta feature make Astro Cat more complex than it actually is.

Similar Slot Machines

We recommend checking out Playtech's many Chinese-themed slot games such as Sun Wukong and Jade Emperor for more fun and exciting gameplay!

Review:
 
Gameplay features

Astro Cat presents a 1296 ways to win format, where the minimum bet is 0.50 coins at a value of 0.01. The bet can be increased exponentially, and you can also choose a bet multiplier of up to 5 times. There are no paylines to select, so it's simply a matter of manually hitting or, if desired, auto-spinning once the desired bet is selected. The basic gameplay action relies on a bonus system that builds in intensity to offer big combination prizes. The RTP is generous, but the hit rate is not as much.

Theme

Astro Cat has an eclectic theme that blends Japanese anime, Asian culture and space exploration. The reels are framed in traditional Chinese style, and there are various Asian symbols, such as bonsai trees, koi carp, Chinese fans, and lucky frogs which are part of the paid icon assembly, along with real playing card symbols. The game's wild symbol is a Japanese anime-style cat, which appears on reels 3 and 4 and replaces all other symbols except the bonus.

Reelfecta system

Astro Cat uses the Reelfecta system, where two 2x3 reels sit next to a 16-position grid reel in the center. The game's colossal reel set makes it appear more complicated than it is, but it mostly plays like a 5x3 reel slot, given the winning format.

Wild and scatter symbols

The Astro Cat wild symbol replaces all the symbols in the game, including the scatter symbol that triggers up to 13 free spins. The scatter symbol is a fireworks symbol, which only appears on the outer reels of the Reelfecta. Landing 5 or more of these on the same spin will trigger the Free Spins feature.

Free spins

The Free Spins feature in Astro Cat rewards players with up to 13 free spins. During this feature, the +1 Wild Cat or the poison symbol appears on the Reelfecta. If a +1 Wild Cat symbol lands, an additional free spin is triggered, and the wild will be frozen in place. The feature can award up to 12 additional free spins. If the poison symbol appears, the feature ends, and the player receives a payout equivalent to 2 times the bet. It is guaranteed that you will not receive a poison symbol in the first three free spins. Filling 12 outer positions with Wild Cats will also fill the inner positions, creating 1 giant wild with 16 symbols. This triggers a Mega Spin with all the extra wilds in place.

Bet amounts

Astro Cat allows players to bet from 0.50 coins at a value of 0.01 up to €1250. The bet can be increased exponentially, and players can also choose a bet multiplier of up to 5 times.

Playable devices

Astro Cat is available on both mobile and desktop devices, and players can enjoy free play or play for real money.

Mega spin feature

Filling 12 outer positions with Wild Cats will create 1 giant wild with 16 symbols, triggering a Mega Spin with all the extra wilds in place. This feature offers players the chance to hit big combination prizes.

Review: Astro Cat
When Japanese anime, Asian-themed slot games and an abundance of Hello Kitty are combined, one is taking a risk, but what you get is represented by the 1296 ways to win the new slot game Astro Cat. Oh yes, we were missing space, this cat has a lot to do! At first glance, we were not sure if a designer had become a rogue or if this was a serious production of Lightning Box slot, as it seems that the eclectic theme is just part of the game's charm.

Available on both mobile and desktop devices, both for free play and as a real money slot, this game clearly hopes to impress with its theme, gameplay, and innovative structure. Like the popular Druidess Gold slot machine from Lightning Box, Astro Cat uses the Reelfecta system, where two 2x3 reels sit next to a 16-position grid reel in the center. It seems a bit confusing, but mostly plays like a 5x3 reel slot, given the winning format.

Astro Cat will take you on a journey to China with an 8 reel and 1296 ways to win slot from Lightning Box Games. A bonus feature is provided that rewards up to a dozen free spins complete with blocks and prizes paid up to 16 times thanks to the Reelfecta game engine. Play from 50 cents up to €1250 per spin.

Space Graphics
I simply cannot explain the theme of this game, there is too much going on. The Astro Cat of the game's title forms the wild game and is clearly in some crazy cosmic adventure. For some reason, this game required a theme in some form of ancient Asian setting, so you get reels framed in traditional Chinese style, with a Japanese anime cat, and some fireworks as a bonus trigger.

There are also other Asian images in the rest of the reels, with bonsai trees, koi carp, Chinese fans, and lucky frogs that are part of the paid icon assembly. The rest of the payment symbols are completed by real playing card symbols and for that once we do not mind; if all the symbols on this giant reel set were tailor-made, I think we would be venturing too far.

The audio is good: it doesn't inspire, but it's hard to produce a single track to accommodate all the different styles; the sound effects are superb, and the animations and rendering are excellent. There is no doubt about the visual credentials of this game, or the care with which the production work has been handled, this is well away from the old Fortune 8 Cat slot game.

The images have a strong Asian touch - in addition to the lower value playing cards, there are fans, bonsai trees, a red fish, a green frog and a dragon. The Japanese anime-style cat is the game's wild - it only appears on reels 3 and 4 and replaces all other symbols except the bonus.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols
With a 1296 ways to win format, the minimum bet is 0.50 coins at a value of 0.01, this can be increased exponentially, and you can also choose a bet multiplier of up to 5 times. There are no paylines to select, so it's simply a matter of manually hitting or, if you're as lazy as me, auto-spinning once the desired bet is selected. The basic gameplay action is a bit silent, like many new online slot game titles, Astro Cat relies on a bonus system that builds in intensity to offer big combination prizes. The RTP is generous, the hit rate, on the other hand, is not as much.

The Astro Cat wild symbol replaces all the symbols in this game, including, very importantly, the game's scatter symbol that triggers up to 13 free spins. This may not seem like the luckiest number, however, wild symbols on the Reelfecta center reel are persistent or sticky, each time one appears it remains in place for the duration of the spins, also adding an extra spin as a re-trigger. If you fill the whole center box with wilds during the free spins, it can trigger a single mega spin. The symbol you don't want to see is the poisoned glass, marked by the ubiquitous skull and crossbones, this will immediately end the free spins.

The fireworks symbol is the bonus, which only appears on the outer reels of the Reelfecta. Landing 5 or more of these on the same spin will trigger the Free Spins feature, where you can see up to 12 free spins.

Once the free spins begin, keep an eye on the Reelfecta - starting from the top left outside position, a +1 Wild Cat or a poison symbol will appear. If you land the +1 Wild Cat, you will receive an additional free spin, and the wild will be frozen in place. Here, up to 12 additional free spins can be awarded.

Fill 12 outer positions with Wild Cats and you will also fill the inner positions - this creates 1 giant wild with 16 symbols. You will then receive 1 Mega Spin with all the extra wilds in place. If the poison appears, you will receive a payout equivalent to 2 times the bet, and the feature ends. It is guaranteed that you will not receive a poison in the first 3 free spins.

The unorthodox game engine and unusual Reelfecta feature make Astro Cat more complex than it really is.
Other similar slot machines
I recommend checking out Playtech, which offers many Chinese-themed slots such as Sun Wukong and Jade Emperor.

A bonus feature is provided that rewards up to a dozen free spins complete with blocks and prizes paid up to 16 times thanks to the Reelfecta game engine. Play from 50 cents up to €1250 per spin.

Space Graphics
I simply cannot explain the theme of this game, there is too much going on. The Astro Cat of the game's title forms the wild game and is clearly in some crazy cosmic adventure. For some reason, this game required a theme in some form of ancient Asian setting, so you get reels framed in traditional Chinese style, with a Japanese anime cat, and some fireworks as a bonus trigger.

There are also other Asian images in the rest of the reels, with bonsai trees, koi carp, Chinese fans, and lucky frogs that are part of the paid icon assembly. The rest of the payment symbols are completed by real playing card symbols and for that once we do not mind; if all the symbols on this giant reel set were tailor-made, I think we would be venturing too far.

The audio is good: it doesn't inspire, but it's hard to produce a single track to accommodate all the different styles; the sound effects are superb, and the animations and rendering are excellent. There is no doubt about the visual credentials of this game, or the care with which the production work has been handled, this is well away from the old Fortune 8 Cat slot game.

The images have a strong Asian touch - in addition to the lower value playing cards, there are fans, bonsai trees, a red fish, a green frog and a dragon. The Japanese anime-style cat is the game's wild - it only appears on reels 3 and 4 and replaces all other symbols except the bonus.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols
With a 1296 ways to win format, the minimum bet is 0.50 coins at a value of 0.01, this can be increased exponentially, and you can also choose a bet multiplier of up to 5 times. There are no paylines to select, so it's simply a matter of manually hitting or, if you're as lazy as me, auto-spinning once the desired bet is selected. The basic gameplay action is a bit silent, like many new online slot game titles, Astro Cat relies on a bonus system that builds in intensity to offer big combination prizes. The RTP is generous, the hit rate, on the other hand, is not as much.

The Astro Cat wild symbol replaces all the symbols in this game, including, very importantly, the game's scatter symbol that triggers up to 13 free spins. This may not seem like the luckiest number, however, wild symbols on the Reelfecta center reel are persistent or sticky, each time one appears it remains in place for the duration of the spins, also adding an extra spin as a re-trigger. If you fill the whole center box with wilds during the free spins, it can trigger a single mega spin. The symbol you don't want to see is the poisoned glass, marked by the ubiquitous skull and crossbones, this will immediately end the free spins.

The fireworks symbol is the bonus, which only appears on the outer reels of the Reelfecta. Landing 5 or more of these on the same spin will trigger the Free Spins feature, where you can see up to 12 free spins.

Once the free spins begin, keep an eye on the Reelfecta - starting from the top left outside position, a +1 Wild Cat or a poison symbol will appear. If you land the +1 Wild Cat, you will receive an additional free spin, and the wild will be frozen in place. Here, up to 12 additional free spins can be awarded.

Fill 12 outer positions with Wild Cats and you will also fill the inner positions - this creates 1 giant wild with 16 symbols. You will then receive 1 Mega Spin with all the extra wilds in place. If the poison appears, you will receive a payout equivalent to 2 times the bet, and the feature ends. It is guaranteed that you will not receive a poison in the first 3 free spins.

The unorthodox game engine and unusual Reelfecta feature make Astro Cat more complex than it really is.
Other similar slot machines
I recommend checking out Playtech, which offers many Chinese-themed slots such as Sun Wukong and Jade Emperor.
